originalText.text:
Whomever said Mr. Leemon is like “SATAN” disturbs me. He is a very very good lawyer, he treats you as family. Please disregard that idiots post. Why would you ever call anybody Satan with no details? Makes no sense and incredible.

Scott has handled a few cases for me. He is always prompt and very genuine. He likes what he does and he does the most he can for his clients. Has become a good friend over the years.

originalText.text: I've had the pleasure of working with Scott Leemon quite often over the past few years and he consistently presents himself in a professional & personable individual who goes the extra mile to ensure his clients needs are met. You are in very capable hands with Scott.

originalText.text: He is a rude person very sharp talking. Doesn't know how to network to the best interest of his client. Definitely  would not refer him to anyone. He acts like SATAN.
